creator: fcamblor@gmail.com
text:
When using some Realm contained class (typically, I use Security Filter and a
CatalinaRealmAdapter) but when I reach init()'s first line, a
NullPointerException is thrown when dealing with the "container.getLogger()"
(container is null).

Looking forward in the code, I saw the "if(container==null)" test, which
indicates that the container object may be null (but the getLogger() call is
made every time... even when it is null !)

creator: markt@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 39875 ***
